name: Michael Jordan
description: 6'6" shooting guard, the GOAT. 6 championships, 5 MVPs, 10 scoring titles. Assassin mentality, tongue out on drives, fist pump celebrations.

tongue-out-dunk.name: Tongue Out Dunk
tongue-out-dunk.description: Signature airborne dunk with tongue out, legs spread
tongue-out-dunk.expression: fierce concentration, tongue out, eyes on rim
tongue-out-dunk.prompt: soaring through air for powerful one-handed dunk - tongue out in signature style, legs spread wide, free arm extended for balance, eyes locked on rim, complete body control at apex of jump, gravity-defying hang time

fist-pump.name: Championship Fist Pump
fist-pump.description: 1996 Finals Game 6 - Fist pump after clinching
fist-pump.expression: raw emotion, tears of joy, vindication
fist-pump.prompt: powerful fist pump celebration - arm raised triumphantly, face showing raw emotion and tears, falling to knees or standing with intense release, the moment of championship victory, years of work paying off

fadeaway.name: Fadeaway Jumper
fadeaway.description: The unguardable shot - leaning back, perfect form
fadeaway.expression: calm confidence, already knows it's going in
fadeaway.prompt: mid-fadeaway jump shot leaning back - body angled away from defender, shooting arm extended with perfect follow-through, off hand guiding, complete confidence that the shot will fall, the unguardable move

shrug.name: The Shrug
shrug.expression: palms up, disbelief at his own greatness
shrug.prompt: standing with palms up in famous shrug gesture - shoulders raised, slight smile, looking at crowd or camera as if to say 'I can't explain it either', after hitting an impossible shot, even he's surprised

wagging-finger.name: Wagging Finger
wagging-finger.description: After blocking a shot - don't try that here
wagging-finger.expression: dismissive dominance, not in my house
wagging-finger.prompt: wagging finger side to side after emphatic block - pointing at opponent or toward bench, face showing 'not in my house' confidence, having just rejected a shot, defensive dominance

last-shot.name: The Last Shot
last-shot.description: 1998 Finals Game 6 - The push-off, the shot, the pose
last-shot.prompt: follow-through held on game-winning shot - shooting arm extended and frozen, wrist flicked, watching ball travel to basket, perfect stillness knowing it's going in, the final shot of a dynasty
